snippet.title: LOOT.io - Official Teaser
snippet.description:
Sign up for our Closed Beta! ➡ https://loot.io/

Get ready for an unforgiving adventure in this addictive 2D rogue-lite shooter right in your browser! Fight enemies to gather the finest loot in the land. Be prepared to inevitably die… over and over and over. Return to the Hub World with the loot you earned, customize your playstyle, invite friends (if you have any), and try again! Death is temporary... Loot is forever. 

For the latest updates follow us on:
Website: https://loot.io/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LootioGame
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/LootioGame/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LootioGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lootiogame/
